content: Similarly, any Transformation can deal good damage here, but be sure not to expend your final attack when he's phasing out, or you'll waste it entirely.

This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-Void'.
The content is as follows:
Similarly, any Transformation can deal good damage here, but be sure not to expend your final attack when he's phasing out, or you'll waste it entirely.
